entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
